4211 namespace {
4212 JSONCPP_STRING valueToString(double value, bool useSpecialFloats, unsigned int precision) {
4213  // Allocate a buffer that is more than large enough to store the 16 digits of
4214  // precision requested below.
4215  char buffer[36];
4216  int len = -1;
4217 
4218  char formatString[6];
4219  sprintf(formatString, "%%.%dg", precision);
4220 
4221  // Print into the buffer. We need not request the alternative representation
4222  // that always has a decimal point because JSON doesn't distingish the
4223  // concepts of reals and integers.
4224  if (isfinite(value)) {
4225  len = snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), formatString, value);
4226 
4227  // try to ensure we preserve the fact that this was given to us as a double on input
4228  if (!strstr(buffer, ".") && !strstr(buffer, "e")) {
4229  strcat(buffer, ".0");
4230  }
4231 
4232  } else {
4233  // IEEE standard states that NaN values will not compare to themselves
4234  if (value != value) {
4235  len = snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), useSpecialFloats ? "NaN" : "null");
4236  } else if (value < 0) {
4237  len = snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), useSpecialFloats ? "-Infinity" : "-1e+9999");
4238  } else {
4239  len = snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), useSpecialFloats ? "Infinity" : "1e+9999");
4240  }
4241  // For those, we do not need to call fixNumLoc, but it is fast.
4242  }
4243  assert(len >= 0);
4244  fixNumericLocale(buffer, buffer + len);
4245  return buffer;
4246 }
4247 }
4248 
4249 JSONCPP_STRING valueToString(double value) { return valueToString(value, false, 17); }
4250 
4251 JSONCPP_STRING valueToString(bool value) { return value ? "true" : "false"; }
4252 
4253 JSONCPP_STRING valueToQuotedString(const char* value) {
4254  if (value == NULL)
4255  return "";
4256  // Not sure how to handle unicode...
4257  if (strpbrk(value, "\"\\\b\f\n\r\t") == NULL &&
4258  !containsControlCharacter(value))
4259  return JSONCPP_STRING("\"") + value + "\"";
4260  // We have to walk value and escape any special characters.
4261  // Appending to JSONCPP_STRING is not efficient, but this should be rare.
4262  // (Note: forward slashes are *not* rare, but I am not escaping them.)
4263  JSONCPP_STRING::size_type maxsize =
4264  strlen(value) * 2 + 3; // allescaped+quotes+NULL
4265  JSONCPP_STRING result;
4266  result.reserve(maxsize); // to avoid lots of mallocs
4267  result += "\"";
4268  for (const char* c = value; *c != 0; ++c) {
4269  switch (*c) {
4270  case '\"':
4271  result += "\\\"";
4272  break;
4273  case '\\':
4274  result += "\\\\";
4275  break;
4276  case '\b':
4277  result += "\\b";
4278  break;
4279  case '\f':
4280  result += "\\f";
4281  break;
4282  case '\n':
4283  result += "\\n";
4284  break;
4285  case '\r':
4286  result += "\\r";
4287  break;
4288  case '\t':
4289  result += "\\t";
4290  break;
4291  // case '/':
4292  // Even though \/ is considered a legal escape in JSON, a bare
4293  // slash is also legal, so I see no reason to escape it.
4294  // (I hope I am not misunderstanding something.
4295  // blep notes: actually escaping \/ may be useful in javascript to avoid </
4296  // sequence.
4297  // Should add a flag to allow this compatibility mode and prevent this
4298  // sequence from occurring.
4299  default:
4300  if (isControlCharacter(*c)) {
4301  JSONCPP_OSTRINGSTREAM oss;
4302  oss << "\\u" << std::hex << std::uppercase << std::setfill('0')
4303  << std::setw(4) << static_cast<int>(*c);
4304  result += oss.str();
4305  } else {
4306  result += *c;
4307  }
4308  break;
4309  }
4310  }
4311  result += "\"";
4312  return result;
4313 }
4314 
4315 // https://github.com/upcaste/upcaste/blob/master/src/upcore/src/cstring/strnpbrk.cpp
4316 static char const* strnpbrk(char const* s, char const* accept, size_t n) {
4317  assert((s || !n) && accept);
4318 
4319  char const* const end = s + n;
4320  for (char const* cur = s; cur < end; ++cur) {
4321  int const c = *cur;
4322  for (char const* a = accept; *a; ++a) {
4323  if (*a == c) {
4324  return cur;
4325  }
4326  }
4327  }
4328  return NULL;
4329 }
4330 static JSONCPP_STRING valueToQuotedStringN(const char* value, unsigned length) {
4331  if (value == NULL)
4332  return "";
4333  // Not sure how to handle unicode...
4334  if (strnpbrk(value, "\"\\\b\f\n\r\t", length) == NULL &&
4335  !containsControlCharacter0(value, length))
4336  return JSONCPP_STRING("\"") + value + "\"";
4337  // We have to walk value and escape any special characters.
4338  // Appending to JSONCPP_STRING is not efficient, but this should be rare.
4339  // (Note: forward slashes are *not* rare, but I am not escaping them.)
4340  JSONCPP_STRING::size_type maxsize =
4341  length * 2 + 3; // allescaped+quotes+NULL
4342  JSONCPP_STRING result;
4343  result.reserve(maxsize); // to avoid lots of mallocs
4344  result += "\"";
4345  char const* end = value + length;
4346  for (const char* c = value; c != end; ++c) {
4347  switch (*c) {
4348  case '\"':
4349  result += "\\\"";
4350  break;
4351  case '\\':
4352  result += "\\\\";
4353  break;
4354  case '\b':
4355  result += "\\b";
4356  break;
4357  case '\f':
4358  result += "\\f";
4359  break;
4360  case '\n':
4361  result += "\\n";
4362  break;
4363  case '\r':
4364  result += "\\r";
4365  break;
4366  case '\t':
4367  result += "\\t";
4368  break;
4369  // case '/':
4370  // Even though \/ is considered a legal escape in JSON, a bare
4371  // slash is also legal, so I see no reason to escape it.
4372  // (I hope I am not misunderstanding something.)
4373  // blep notes: actually escaping \/ may be useful in javascript to avoid </
4374  // sequence.
4375  // Should add a flag to allow this compatibility mode and prevent this
4376  // sequence from occurring.
4377  default:
4378  if ((isControlCharacter(*c)) || (*c == 0)) {
4379  JSONCPP_OSTRINGSTREAM oss;
4380  oss << "\\u" << std::hex << std::uppercase << std::setfill('0')
4381  << std::setw(4) << static_cast<int>(*c);
4382  result += oss.str();
4383  } else {
4384  result += *c;
4385  }
4386  break;
4387  }
4388  }
4389  result += "\"";
4390  return result;
4391 }

4410 JSONCPP_STRING FastWriter::write(const Value& root) {

4413  if (!omitEndingLineFeed_)
4414  document_ += "\n";
4415  return document_;

4417 
4418 void FastWriter::writeValue(const Value& value) {
4419  switch (value.type()) {
4420  case nullValue:
4421  if (!dropNullPlaceholders_)
4422  document_ += "null";
4423  break;
4424  case intValue:
4425  document_ += valueToString(value.asLargestInt());
4426  break;
4427  case uintValue:
4428  document_ += valueToString(value.asLargestUInt());
4429  break;
4430  case realValue:
4431  document_ += valueToString(value.asDouble());
4432  break;
4433  case stringValue:
4434  {
4435  // Is NULL possible for value.string_? No.
4436  char const* str;
4437  char const* end;
4438  bool ok = value.getString(&str, &end);
4439  if (ok) document_ += valueToQuotedStringN(str, static_cast<unsigned>(end-str));
4440  break;
4441  }
4442  case booleanValue:
4443  document_ += valueToString(value.asBool());
4444  break;
4445  case arrayValue: {
4446  document_ += '[';
4447  ArrayIndex size = value.size();
4448  for (ArrayIndex index = 0; index < size; ++index) {
4449  if (index > 0)
4450  document_ += ',';
4451  writeValue(value[index]);
4452  }
4453  document_ += ']';
4454  } break;
4455  case objectValue: {
4456  Value::Members members(value.getMemberNames());
4457  document_ += '{';
4458  for (Value::Members::iterator it = members.begin(); it != members.end();
4459  ++it) {
4460  const JSONCPP_STRING& name = *it;
4461  if (it != members.begin())
4462  document_ += ',';
4463  document_ += valueToQuotedStringN(name.data(), static_cast<unsigned>(name.length()));
4464  document_ += yamlCompatiblityEnabled_ ? ": " : ":";
4465  writeValue(value[name]);
4466  }
4467  document_ += '}';
4468  } break;
4469  }
4470 }

4478 JSONCPP_STRING StyledWriter::write(const Value& root) {
4479  document_ = "";
4480  addChildValues_ = false;
4481  indentString_ = "";
4482  writeCommentBeforeValue(root);
4483  writeValue(root);
4484  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(root);
4485  document_ += "\n";
4486  return document_;
4487 }
4488 
4489 void StyledWriter::writeValue(const Value& value) {
4490  switch (value.type()) {
4491  case nullValue:
4492  pushValue("null");
4493  break;
4494  case intValue:
4495  pushValue(valueToString(value.asLargestInt()));
4496  break;
4497  case uintValue:
4498  pushValue(valueToString(value.asLargestUInt()));
4499  break;
4500  case realValue:
4501  pushValue(valueToString(value.asDouble()));
4502  break;
4503  case stringValue:
4504  {
4505  // Is NULL possible for value.string_? No.
4506  char const* str;
4507  char const* end;
4508  bool ok = value.getString(&str, &end);
4509  if (ok) pushValue(valueToQuotedStringN(str, static_cast<unsigned>(end-str)));
4510  else pushValue("");
4511  break;
4512  }
4513  case booleanValue:
4514  pushValue(valueToString(value.asBool()));
4515  break;
4516  case arrayValue:
4517  writeArrayValue(value);
4518  break;
4519  case objectValue: {
4520  Value::Members members(value.getMemberNames());
4521  if (members.empty())
4522  pushValue("{}");
4523  else {
4524  writeWithIndent("{");
4525  indent();
4526  Value::Members::iterator it = members.begin();
4527  for (;;) {
4528  const JSONCPP_STRING& name = *it;
4529  const Value& childValue = value[name];
4530  writeCommentBeforeValue(childValue);
4531  writeWithIndent(valueToQuotedString(name.c_str()));
4532  document_ += " : ";
4533  writeValue(childValue);
4534  if (++it == members.end()) {
4535  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
4536  break;
4537  }
4538  document_ += ',';
4539  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
4540  }
4541  unindent();
4542  writeWithIndent("}");
4543  }
4544  } break;
4545  }
4546 }
4547 
4548 void StyledWriter::writeArrayValue(const Value& value) {
4549  unsigned size = value.size();
4550  if (size == 0)
4551  pushValue("[]");
4552  else {
4553  bool isArrayMultiLine = isMultineArray(value);
4554  if (isArrayMultiLine) {
4555  writeWithIndent("[");
4556  indent();
4557  bool hasChildValue = !childValues_.empty();
4558  unsigned index = 0;
4559  for (;;) {
4560  const Value& childValue = value[index];
4561  writeCommentBeforeValue(childValue);
4562  if (hasChildValue)
4563  writeWithIndent(childValues_[index]);
4564  else {
4565  writeIndent();
4566  writeValue(childValue);
4567  }
4568  if (++index == size) {
4569  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
4570  break;
4571  }
4572  document_ += ',';
4573  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
4574  }
4575  unindent();
4576  writeWithIndent("]");
4577  } else // output on a single line
4578  {
4579  assert(childValues_.size() == size);
4580  document_ += "[ ";
4581  for (unsigned index = 0; index < size; ++index) {
4582  if (index > 0)
4583  document_ += ", ";
4584  document_ += childValues_[index];
4585  }
4586  document_ += " ]";
4587  }
4588  }
4589 }
4590 
4591 bool StyledWriter::isMultineArray(const Value& value) {
4592  ArrayIndex const size = value.size();
4593  bool isMultiLine = size * 3 >= rightMargin_;
4594  childValues_.clear();
4595  for (ArrayIndex index = 0; index < size && !isMultiLine; ++index) {
4596  const Value& childValue = value[index];
4597  isMultiLine = ((childValue.isArray() || childValue.isObject()) &&
4598  childValue.size() > 0);
4599  }
4600  if (!isMultiLine) // check if line length > max line length
4601  {
4602  childValues_.reserve(size);
4603  addChildValues_ = true;
4604  ArrayIndex lineLength = 4 + (size - 1) * 2; // '[ ' + ', '*n + ' ]'
4605  for (ArrayIndex index = 0; index < size; ++index) {
4606  if (hasCommentForValue(value[index])) {
4607  isMultiLine = true;
4608  }
4609  writeValue(value[index]);
4610  lineLength += static_cast<ArrayIndex>(childValues_[index].length());
4611  }
4612  addChildValues_ = false;
4613  isMultiLine = isMultiLine || lineLength >= rightMargin_;
4614  }
4615  return isMultiLine;
4616 }
4617 
4618 void StyledWriter::pushValue(const JSONCPP_STRING& value) {
4619  if (addChildValues_)
4620  childValues_.push_back(value);
4621  else
4622  document_ += value;
4623 }
4624 
4625 void StyledWriter::writeIndent() {
4626  if (!document_.empty()) {
4627  char last = document_[document_.length() - 1];
4628  if (last == ' ') // already indented
4629  return;
4630  if (last != '\n') // Comments may add new-line
4631  document_ += '\n';
4632  }
4633  document_ += indentString_;
4634 }
4635 
4636 void StyledWriter::writeWithIndent(const JSONCPP_STRING& value) {
4637  writeIndent();
4638  document_ += value;
4639 }

4641 void StyledWriter::indent() { indentString_ += JSONCPP_STRING(indentSize_, ' '); }
4642 
4643 void StyledWriter::unindent() {
4644  assert(indentString_.size() >= indentSize_);
4645  indentString_.resize(indentString_.size() - indentSize_);
4646 }
4647 
4648 void StyledWriter::writeCommentBeforeValue(const Value& root) {
4649  if (!root.hasComment(commentBefore))
4650  return;
4651 
4652  document_ += "\n";
4653  writeIndent();
4654  const JSONCPP_STRING& comment = root.getComment(commentBefore);
4655  JSONCPP_STRING::const_iterator iter = comment.begin();
4656  while (iter != comment.end()) {
4657  document_ += *iter;
4658  if (*iter == '\n' &&
4659  (iter != comment.end() && *(iter + 1) == '/'))
4660  writeIndent();
4661  ++iter;
4662  }
4663 
4664  // Comments are stripped of trailing newlines, so add one here
4665  document_ += "\n";
4666 }
4667 
4668 void StyledWriter::writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(const Value& root) {
4669  if (root.hasComment(commentAfterOnSameLine))
4670  document_ += " " + root.getComment(commentAfterOnSameLine);
4671 
4672  if (root.hasComment(commentAfter)) {
4673  document_ += "\n";
4674  document_ += root.getComment(commentAfter);
4675  document_ += "\n";
4676  }
4677 }
4678 
4679 bool StyledWriter::hasCommentForValue(const Value& value) {
4680  return value.hasComment(commentBefore) ||
4681  value.hasComment(commentAfterOnSameLine) ||
4682  value.hasComment(commentAfter);
4683 }

4692 void StyledStreamWriter::write(JSONCPP_OSTREAM& out, const Value& root) {
4693  document_ = &out;
4694  addChildValues_ = false;
4695  indentString_ = "";
4696  indented_ = true;
4697  writeCommentBeforeValue(root);
4698  if (!indented_) writeIndent();
4699  indented_ = true;
4700  writeValue(root);
4701  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(root);
4702  *document_ << "\n";
4703  document_ = NULL; // Forget the stream, for safety.
4704 }

4712  pushValue(valueToString(value.asLargestInt()));

4724  char const* end;

4726  if (ok) pushValue(valueToQuotedStringN(str, static_cast<unsigned>(end-str)));
4727  else pushValue("");

4765 void StyledStreamWriter::writeArrayValue(const Value& value) {

4768  pushValue("[]");

4781  else {

4796  } else // output on a single line
4797  {

4799  *document_ << "[ ";
4800  for (unsigned index = 0; index < size; ++index) {
4801  if (index > 0)
4802  *document_ << ", ";
4803  *document_ << childValues_[index];
4804  }
4805  *document_ << " ]";
4806  }
4807  }
4808 }

4865 void StyledStreamWriter::writeCommentBeforeValue(const Value& root) {
4866  if (!root.hasComment(commentBefore))
4867  return;
4868 
4869  if (!indented_) writeIndent();
4870  const JSONCPP_STRING& comment = root.getComment(commentBefore);
4871  JSONCPP_STRING::const_iterator iter = comment.begin();
4872  while (iter != comment.end()) {
4873  *document_ << *iter;
4874  if (*iter == '\n' &&
4875  (iter != comment.end() && *(iter + 1) == '/'))
4876  // writeIndent(); // would include newline
4877  *document_ << indentString_;
4878  ++iter;
4879  }
4880  indented_ = false;
4881 }
4882 
4883 void StyledStreamWriter::writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(const Value& root) {
4884  if (root.hasComment(commentAfterOnSameLine))
4885  *document_ << ' ' << root.getComment(commentAfterOnSameLine);
4886 
4887  if (root.hasComment(commentAfter)) {
4888  writeIndent();
4889  *document_ << root.getComment(commentAfter);
4890  }
4891  indented_ = false;
4892 }
4893 
4894 bool StyledStreamWriter::hasCommentForValue(const Value& value) {
4895  return value.hasComment(commentBefore) ||
4896  value.hasComment(commentAfterOnSameLine) ||
4897  value.hasComment(commentAfter);
4898 }

4907  None,
4908  Most,
4909  All

4913 struct BuiltStyledStreamWriter : public StreamWriter
4914 {
4915  BuiltStyledStreamWriter(
4916  JSONCPP_STRING const& indentation,
4917  CommentStyle::Enum cs,
4918  JSONCPP_STRING const& colonSymbol,
4919  JSONCPP_STRING const& nullSymbol,
4920  JSONCPP_STRING const& endingLineFeedSymbol,
4921  bool useSpecialFloats,
4922  unsigned int precision);
4923  int write(Value const& root, JSONCPP_OSTREAM* sout) JSONCPP_OVERRIDE;
4924 private:
4925  void writeValue(Value const& value);
4926  void writeArrayValue(Value const& value);
4927  bool isMultineArray(Value const& value);
4928  void pushValue(JSONCPP_STRING const& value);
4929  void writeIndent();
4930  void writeWithIndent(JSONCPP_STRING const& value);
4931  void indent();
4932  void unindent();
4933  void writeCommentBeforeValue(Value const& root);
4934  void writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(Value const& root);
4935  static bool hasCommentForValue(const Value& value);
4936 
4937  typedef std::vector<JSONCPP_STRING> ChildValues;
4938 
4939  ChildValues childValues_;
4940  JSONCPP_STRING indentString_;
4941  unsigned int rightMargin_;
4942  JSONCPP_STRING indentation_;
4943  CommentStyle::Enum cs_;
4944  JSONCPP_STRING colonSymbol_;
4945  JSONCPP_STRING nullSymbol_;
4946  JSONCPP_STRING endingLineFeedSymbol_;
4947  bool addChildValues_ : 1;
4948  bool indented_ : 1;
4949  bool useSpecialFloats_ : 1;
4950  unsigned int precision_;
4951 };
4952 BuiltStyledStreamWriter::BuiltStyledStreamWriter(
4953  JSONCPP_STRING const& indentation,
4954  CommentStyle::Enum cs,
4955  JSONCPP_STRING const& colonSymbol,
4956  JSONCPP_STRING const& nullSymbol,
4957  JSONCPP_STRING const& endingLineFeedSymbol,
4958  bool useSpecialFloats,
4959  unsigned int precision)
4960  : rightMargin_(74)
4961  , indentation_(indentation)
4962  , cs_(cs)
4963  , colonSymbol_(colonSymbol)
4964  , nullSymbol_(nullSymbol)
4965  , endingLineFeedSymbol_(endingLineFeedSymbol)
4966  , addChildValues_(false)
4967  , indented_(false)
4968  , useSpecialFloats_(useSpecialFloats)
4969  , precision_(precision)
4970 {
4971 }
4972 int BuiltStyledStreamWriter::write(Value const& root, JSONCPP_OSTREAM* sout)
4973 {
4974  sout_ = sout;
4975  addChildValues_ = false;
4976  indented_ = true;
4977  indentString_ = "";
4978  writeCommentBeforeValue(root);
4979  if (!indented_) writeIndent();
4980  indented_ = true;
4981  writeValue(root);
4982  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(root);
4983  *sout_ << endingLineFeedSymbol_;
4984  sout_ = NULL;
4985  return 0;
4986 }
4987 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::writeValue(Value const& value) {
4988  switch (value.type()) {
4989  case nullValue:
4990  pushValue(nullSymbol_);
4991  break;
4992  case intValue:
4993  pushValue(valueToString(value.asLargestInt()));
4994  break;
4995  case uintValue:
4996  pushValue(valueToString(value.asLargestUInt()));
4997  break;
4998  case realValue:
4999  pushValue(valueToString(value.asDouble(), useSpecialFloats_, precision_));
5000  break;
5001  case stringValue:
5002  {
5003  // Is NULL is possible for value.string_? No.
5004  char const* str;
5005  char const* end;
5006  bool ok = value.getString(&str, &end);
5007  if (ok) pushValue(valueToQuotedStringN(str, static_cast<unsigned>(end-str)));
5008  else pushValue("");
5009  break;
5010  }
5011  case booleanValue:
5012  pushValue(valueToString(value.asBool()));
5013  break;
5014  case arrayValue:
5015  writeArrayValue(value);
5016  break;
5017  case objectValue: {
5018  Value::Members members(value.getMemberNames());
5019  if (members.empty())
5020  pushValue("{}");
5021  else {
5022  writeWithIndent("{");
5023  indent();
5024  Value::Members::iterator it = members.begin();
5025  for (;;) {
5026  JSONCPP_STRING const& name = *it;
5027  Value const& childValue = value[name];
5028  writeCommentBeforeValue(childValue);
5029  writeWithIndent(valueToQuotedStringN(name.data(), static_cast<unsigned>(name.length())));
5030  *sout_ << colonSymbol_;
5031  writeValue(childValue);
5032  if (++it == members.end()) {
5033  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
5034  break;
5035  }
5036  *sout_ << ",";
5037  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
5038  }
5039  unindent();
5040  writeWithIndent("}");
5041  }
5042  } break;
5043  }
5044 }
5045 
5046 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::writeArrayValue(Value const& value) {
5047  unsigned size = value.size();
5048  if (size == 0)
5049  pushValue("[]");
5050  else {
5051  bool isMultiLine = (cs_ == CommentStyle::All) || isMultineArray(value);
5052  if (isMultiLine) {
5053  writeWithIndent("[");
5054  indent();
5055  bool hasChildValue = !childValues_.empty();
5056  unsigned index = 0;
5057  for (;;) {
5058  Value const& childValue = value[index];
5059  writeCommentBeforeValue(childValue);
5060  if (hasChildValue)
5061  writeWithIndent(childValues_[index]);
5062  else {
5063  if (!indented_) writeIndent();
5064  indented_ = true;
5065  writeValue(childValue);
5066  indented_ = false;
5067  }
5068  if (++index == size) {
5069  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
5070  break;
5071  }
5072  *sout_ << ",";
5073  writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(childValue);
5074  }
5075  unindent();
5076  writeWithIndent("]");
5077  } else // output on a single line
5078  {
5079  assert(childValues_.size() == size);
5080  *sout_ << "[";
5081  if (!indentation_.empty()) *sout_ << " ";
5082  for (unsigned index = 0; index < size; ++index) {
5083  if (index > 0)
5084  *sout_ << ((!indentation_.empty()) ? ", " : ",");
5085  *sout_ << childValues_[index];
5086  }
5087  if (!indentation_.empty()) *sout_ << " ";
5088  *sout_ << "]";
5089  }
5090  }
5091 }
5092 
5093 bool BuiltStyledStreamWriter::isMultineArray(Value const& value) {
5094  ArrayIndex const size = value.size();
5095  bool isMultiLine = size * 3 >= rightMargin_;
5096  childValues_.clear();
5097  for (ArrayIndex index = 0; index < size && !isMultiLine; ++index) {
5098  Value const& childValue = value[index];
5099  isMultiLine = ((childValue.isArray() || childValue.isObject()) &&
5100  childValue.size() > 0);
5101  }
5102  if (!isMultiLine) // check if line length > max line length
5103  {
5104  childValues_.reserve(size);
5105  addChildValues_ = true;
5106  ArrayIndex lineLength = 4 + (size - 1) * 2; // '[ ' + ', '*n + ' ]'
5107  for (ArrayIndex index = 0; index < size; ++index) {
5108  if (hasCommentForValue(value[index])) {
5109  isMultiLine = true;
5110  }
5111  writeValue(value[index]);
5112  lineLength += static_cast<ArrayIndex>(childValues_[index].length());
5113  }
5114  addChildValues_ = false;
5115  isMultiLine = isMultiLine || lineLength >= rightMargin_;
5116  }
5117  return isMultiLine;
5118 }
5119 
5120 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::pushValue(JSONCPP_STRING const& value) {
5121  if (addChildValues_)
5122  childValues_.push_back(value);
5123  else
5124  *sout_ << value;
5125 }
5126 
5127 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::writeIndent() {
5128  // blep intended this to look at the so-far-written string
5129  // to determine whether we are already indented, but
5130  // with a stream we cannot do that. So we rely on some saved state.
5131  // The caller checks indented_.
5132 
5133  if (!indentation_.empty()) {
5134  // In this case, drop newlines too.
5135  *sout_ << '\n' << indentString_;
5136  }
5137 }
5138 
5139 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::writeWithIndent(JSONCPP_STRING const& value) {
5140  if (!indented_) writeIndent();
5141  *sout_ << value;
5142  indented_ = false;
5143 }
5144 
5145 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::indent() { indentString_ += indentation_; }
5146 
5147 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::unindent() {
5148  assert(indentString_.size() >= indentation_.size());
5149  indentString_.resize(indentString_.size() - indentation_.size());
5150 }
5151 
5152 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::writeCommentBeforeValue(Value const& root) {
5153  if (cs_ == CommentStyle::None) return;
5154  if (!root.hasComment(commentBefore))
5155  return;
5156 
5157  if (!indented_) writeIndent();
5158  const JSONCPP_STRING& comment = root.getComment(commentBefore);
5159  JSONCPP_STRING::const_iterator iter = comment.begin();
5160  while (iter != comment.end()) {
5161  *sout_ << *iter;
5162  if (*iter == '\n' &&
5163  (iter != comment.end() && *(iter + 1) == '/'))
5164  // writeIndent(); // would write extra newline
5165  *sout_ << indentString_;
5166  ++iter;
5167  }
5168  indented_ = false;
5169 }
5170 
5171 void BuiltStyledStreamWriter::writeCommentAfterValueOnSameLine(Value const& root) {
5172  if (cs_ == CommentStyle::None) return;
5173  if (root.hasComment(commentAfterOnSameLine))
5174  *sout_ << " " + root.getComment(commentAfterOnSameLine);
5175 
5176  if (root.hasComment(commentAfter)) {
5177  writeIndent();
5178  *sout_ << root.getComment(commentAfter);
5179  }
5180 }

5184  return value.hasComment(commentBefore) ||
5185  value.hasComment(commentAfterOnSameLine) ||
5186  value.hasComment(commentAfter);
5187 }

5207 StreamWriter* StreamWriterBuilder::newStreamWriter() const
5208 {
5209  JSONCPP_STRING indentation = settings_["indentation"].asString();
5210  JSONCPP_STRING cs_str = settings_["commentStyle"].asString();
5211  bool eyc = settings_["enableYAMLCompatibility"].asBool();
5212  bool dnp = settings_["dropNullPlaceholders"].asBool();
5213  bool usf = settings_["useSpecialFloats"].asBool();
5214  unsigned int pre = settings_["precision"].asUInt();
5215  CommentStyle::Enum cs = CommentStyle::All;
5216  if (cs_str == "All") {
5217  cs = CommentStyle::All;
5218  } else if (cs_str == "None") {
5219  cs = CommentStyle::None;
5220  } else {
5221  throwRuntimeError("commentStyle must be 'All' or 'None'");
5222  }
5223  JSONCPP_STRING colonSymbol = " : ";
5224  if (eyc) {
5225  colonSymbol = ": ";
5226  } else if (indentation.empty()) {
5227  colonSymbol = ":";
5228  }
5229  JSONCPP_STRING nullSymbol = "null";
5230  if (dnp) {
5231  nullSymbol = "";
5232  }
5233  if (pre > 17) pre = 17;
5234  JSONCPP_STRING endingLineFeedSymbol = "";
5235  return new BuiltStyledStreamWriter(
5236  indentation, cs,
5237  colonSymbol, nullSymbol, endingLineFeedSymbol, usf, pre);
5238 }
5239 static void getValidWriterKeys(std::set<JSONCPP_STRING>* valid_keys)
5240 {
5241  valid_keys->clear();
5242  valid_keys->insert("indentation");
5243  valid_keys->insert("commentStyle");
5244  valid_keys->insert("enableYAMLCompatibility");
5245  valid_keys->insert("dropNullPlaceholders");
5246  valid_keys->insert("useSpecialFloats");
5247  valid_keys->insert("precision");
5248 }
5249 bool StreamWriterBuilder::validate(Json::Value* invalid) const
5250 {
5251  Json::Value my_invalid;
5252  if (!invalid) invalid = &my_invalid; // so we do not need to test for NULL
5253  Json::Value& inv = *invalid;
5254  std::set<JSONCPP_STRING> valid_keys;
5255  getValidWriterKeys(&valid_keys);
5256  Value::Members keys = settings_.getMemberNames();
5257  size_t n = keys.size();
5258  for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
5259  JSONCPP_STRING const& key = keys[i];
5260  if (valid_keys.find(key) == valid_keys.end()) {
5261  inv[key] = settings_[key];
5262  }
5263  }
5264  return 0u == inv.size();
5265 }
5266 Value& StreamWriterBuilder::operator[](JSONCPP_STRING key)
5267 {
5268  return settings_[key];
5269 }
5270 // static
5271 void StreamWriterBuilder::setDefaults(Json::Value* settings)
5272 {
5274  (*settings)["commentStyle"] = "All";
5275  (*settings)["indentation"] = "\t";
5276  (*settings)["enableYAMLCompatibility"] = false;
5277  (*settings)["dropNullPlaceholders"] = false;
5278  (*settings)["useSpecialFloats"] = false;
5279  (*settings)["precision"] = 17;
5281 }

5283 JSONCPP_STRING writeString(StreamWriter::Factory const& builder, Value const& root) {
5284  JSONCPP_OSTRINGSTREAM sout;
5285  StreamWriterPtr const writer(builder.newStreamWriter());
5286  writer->write(root, &sout);
5287  return sout.str();
5288 }

5290 JSONCPP_OSTREAM& operator<<(JSONCPP_OSTREAM& sout, Value const& root) {

5293  writer->write(root, &sout);
5294  return sout;
5295 }
